Literature.Title: Non-toxic antimicrobial peptide Hm-AMP2 from leech metagenome
Literature.Author: Grafskaia EN, Pavlova ER, Latsis IA, Malakhova MV, Ivchenkov DV, Bashkirov PV, Kot EF, Mineev KS, Arseniev AS, Klinov DV, Lazarev VN

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM,Mouse fibroblasts McCoy:LC90=>100 µM,Human primary fibroblasts FF1:LC90=100 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:LC90=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168 HT(MIC=12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ST88(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus 527(MIC=47.8µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=47.8µM),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=23.9µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>100µM),Human Malignant Melanoma MeWo(LC90=>100µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(LC90=>100µM)
